https://climatecasechart.com/case/allian.description: Description: Challenge to the U.S. Forest Service’s decisions to proceed with a project that would open 36,400 acres of the Colville National Forest to commercial logging, pre-commercial logging, and burning.

https://climatecasechart.com/case/standi.description: Description: Action seeking to enjoin commercial logging and road construction in White Mountain National Forest in connection with two projects authorized by the U.S. Forest Service.

https://climatecasechart.com/case/iowa-v.description: Description: Challenge to Biden administration NEPA regulations.

https://climatecasechart.com/case/friend.description: Description: Challenge to environmental review for the awarding of funding to prevent the Diablo Canyon nuclear power plant from ceasing operations.

https://climatecasechart.com/case/sierra.description: Description: Challenge to FERC’s authorization of a 32-mile pipeline and appurtenant facilities that would provide gas transportation service to the Tennessee Valley Authority to support a new gas-fired power plant.

https://climatecasechart.com/case/falkir.description: Description: Coal mining company's lawsuit to compel federal defendants to complete their environmental review for an emergency coal lease application.

https://climatecasechart.com/case/john-m.description: Description: Challenge to the U.S. Forest Service’s environmental review of logging activity in Plumas National Forest in California.
https://climatecasechart.com/case/john-m.plaintiff: John Muir Project of Earth Island Institute

https://climatecasechart.com/case/sierra.description: Description: Challenge to Tennessee Valley Authority's decision to build a natural gas-fired power plant at an existing facility.

https://climatecasechart.com/case/nation.description: Description: Challenge to federal agency actions that would facilitate development of a high-voltage transmission line from Dubuque County, Iowa, to Middleton, Wisconsin, passing through the Upper Mississippi River National Wildlife and Fish Refuge.

https://climatecasechart.com/case/salt-l.description: Description: Challenge to federal and Utah defendants' review and authorization of transportation improvements in Little Cottonwood Canyon.

https://climatecasechart.com/case/signal.description: Description: Lawsuit to compel the Office of Surface Mining Reclamation and Enforcement to complete the environmental review for a mining plan for a Montana coal mine by NEPA's statutory deadline.

https://climatecasechart.com/case/sierra.description: Description: Challenge to the U.S. Forest Service’s authorizations of logging and vegetation management projects in the footprints of two recent fires in the Giant Sequoia National Monument and the Sequoia National Forest.

https://climatecasechart.com/case/chatto.description: Description: Challenge to the U.S. Forest Service’s alleged failure to account for the aggregate carbon effects of actions taken each year to fulfill annual “timber targets."

https://climatecasechart.com/case/americ.description: Description: Challenge to the Bureau of Ocean Energy Management’s approval of the 2024-2029 National Outer Continental Shelf Oil and Gas Leasing Program.

https://climatecasechart.com/case/jurisi.description: Description: Challenge to the U.S. Army Corps of Engineers authorization of a sediment diversion project in southern Louisiana that was intended to support coastal resiliency to climate change.

https://climatecasechart.com/case/green-.description: Description: Challenge to Bureau of Ocean Energy Management approvals of two wind energy projects off the coast of Rhode Island.

https://climatecasechart.com/case/oregon.description: Description: Challenge to the the U.S. Air Force’s decision to expand military aircraft training over the Owyhee Canyonlands of Oregon, Idaho, and Nevada.
https://climatecasechart.com/case/oregon.defendant: U.S. Department of the Air Force

https://climatecasechart.com/case/columb.description: Description: Environmental groups' challenge to the Federal Energy Regulatory Commission’s authorization for natural gas compression facilities in Idaho, Washington, and Oregon to enable expansion of pipeline system transportation capacity.

https://climatecasechart.com/case/southe.description: Description: Lawsuit challenging four oil and gas lease sales conducted in 2018 and 2019 that covered 215,325 acres of public lands in Utah.

https://climatecasechart.com/case/willam.description: Description: Challenge to the environmental review for logging on approximately 4,600 acres in Oregon.

https://climatecasechart.com/case/county.description: Description: Challenge to the Bureau of Ocean Energy Management’s approval of the Ocean Wind 1 Project, a 161,000-acre offshore wind farm on the Atlantic Outer Continental Shelf.

https://climatecasechart.com/case/golden.description: Description: Challenge to NEPA review in connection with development of a new apartment building in Marin City, California.

https://climatecasechart.com/case/cascad.description: Description: Challenge to the U.S. Bureau of Land Management's review of a forest management project that allegedly authorized logging of 3,608 acres of old-growth forest.

https://climatecasechart.com/case/desert.description: Description: Challenge to the National Environmental Policy Act review in connection with a right-of-way for an electrical line and water supply pipeline for a pumped storage electrical generation project.

https://climatecasechart.com/case/snider.description: Description: Pro se plaintiff's lawsuit challenging President Biden's executive orders regarding climate change.

https://climatecasechart.com/case/klamat.description: Description: Challenge to the U.S. Forest Service’s authorization of a roadside hazard tree project covering nine national forests in California.

https://climatecasechart.com/case/health.description: Description: Challenge to the U.S. Department of the Interior’s decision to hold Gulf of Mexico Oil and Gas Lease Sale 261.

https://climatecasechart.com/case/center.description: Description: Challenge to the approval of exports of liquefied natural gas from the Alaska LNG Project.

https://climatecasechart.com/case/health.description: Description: Challenge to issuance of a certificate of public convenience and necessity for construction and operation of two interstate natural gas pipelines in Louisiana.

https://climatecasechart.com/case/center.description: Description: Challenge to a project in the Kootenai National Forest that included commercial timber harvest on 3,902 acres.
